name: .BCUP
summary: Learn about .BCUP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a BCUP file with all versions of Buttercup (multiplatform). For example, to open a local BCUP file with the desktop version of Buttercup:
Open Buttercup and select Vaults â†’ Add New.
In the Add Vault window, select File.
In the Add Vault File window, select Load Existing.
Navigate to and open your BCUP file.
Remember, however, that to open a BCUP file, you must know the file's password.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .bcup file in Buttercup
images.caption: BCUP file open in Buttercup
